CONTRACT_ID: FW053-230334-A Marine Diesel for CCGS John Cabot
short_summary: Purchase of 120,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel
description: The delivery of 120,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel to the CCGS John Cabot at Gaspe, Quebec. The fuel is required on September 5, 2023.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: FW053-230334-A Marine Diesel for CCGS John Cabot

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the supply of a total potential quantity of 120,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel (PAN 15101509) for the Canadian Coast Guard Vessel, CCGS John Cabot.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4157359425
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4157359425
* **Publication Date**: August 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 28, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 5, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Product Specifications

* **Product Code**: PAN 15101509 (Marine fuel)
* **Quality**: Naval Distillate Fuel
* **Quantity**:
	+ Firm Quantity: 100,000 litres
	+ Optional Quantity: 20,000 litres
* **Delivery Location**: CCGS John Cabot at Gaspe, Quebec
* **Delivery Date**: September 5, 2023

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name**: Bobbi MacLeod (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17223005?extsite=MTcyMjMwMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Note

Please note that the tender closing date has been amended to August 28, 2023 at 14:00:00. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. The optional quantity of fuel may be exercised in whole or in part at the time of ordering the firm quantity or in time for the delivery.
